definition[0]: to twist your face in an ugly way because you do not like something, because you are feeling pain, or because you are trying to be funny
example[0]: She sipped the whisky and grimaced.
example[1]: She grimaced at her reflection in the mirror.
definition[1]: an expression you make by twisting your face because you do not like something or because you are feeling pain
example[2]: His face twisted in a grimace of pain.
